titleStmt.title: A sacred poem describing the miraculous life and death of the glorious conuert S· Marie of Ægipt who passed fortie seauen yeares in the desarts leading a penitentiall life to the astonishment of all succeeding ages.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Robert, 1597-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the widow of M. Wyon,

notesStmt.note: By Robert Howard. Sometimes misattributed to Sir Robert Howard.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
